title: オールカマーの後に・負けて、爆走

text_block_list.text: Today's Twin Turbo was amazing, she said you could feel her determination to win, and as she was speaking—
Overjoyed at beating Matikanetannhauser, Twin Turbo dashes off in the opposite direction from the way back to the academy...!
After some twists and turns, they safely catch Twin Turbo, and the two head home together in good spirits.
